about_the_game:
Blast off to adventure, and blast some robots, too... you'll have plenty of ammunition in the fight against boring soundscapes with the Sci-Fi SFX Pack! Weapons, wooshes, missiles, droids, blasters, beeps, clicks and clunks are what you need to power up the audio engines of your next intergalactic game project. If you're planning a droid invasion or you're boldly going where no one's gone before, this pack is for you!

Features:

- 300 scifi SFX! Blasters, beeps, strange noises, powerups, and other otherworldly audio!
- BONUS CONTENT includes 5 tracks of atmospheric BGM soundscape!
- .ogg and .m4a formats included.
- Royalty free sound effects to use in your commercial and non-commercial game projects.

* OK for use in games with gore

detailed_description:
Please Read Before You Buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Sci-Fi Sound Effects" and "RPG Maker MV - Sci-Fi Sound Effects" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!


About the Game

Blast off to adventure, and blast some robots, too... you'll have plenty of ammunition in the fight against boring soundscapes with the Sci-Fi SFX Pack! Weapons, wooshes, missiles, droids, blasters, beeps, clicks and clunks are what you need to power up the audio engines of your next intergalactic game project. If you're planning a droid invasion or you're boldly going where no one's gone before, this pack is for you! Features: - 300 scifi SFX! Blasters, beeps, strange noises, powerups, and other otherworldly audio! - BONUS CONTENT includes 5 tracks of atmospheric BGM soundscape! - .ogg and .m4a formats included. - Royalty free sound effects to use in your commercial and non-commercial game projects. short_description: Blasters, beeps and bots are just a fraction of the futuristic frequencies you'll find in this auditory anthology of the sounds of science fiction!
supported_languages: English, Japanese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
